Screen-one.intro-text: Дякую, що завітали до мене! Як ви, певно, вже здогадались, я - web розробник. Мій улюблений тулбокс - це MEAN стек, але, звісно, цим мій досвід не обмежується, наприклад, для цієї сторнінки використано Next.js :)

Screen-two.subtitle: Хто ж я
Screen-two.title: Трохи про мене
Screen-two.desc: Seamlessly initiate standardized vortals and visionary catalysts for change. Interactively redefine synergistic supply chains through leading-edge best practices. Professionally architect standards compliant internal or 'organic' sources whereas team building supply chains. Competently drive seamless benefits vis-a-vis optimal platforms.
Screen-two.name: Павло Іващенко

Screen-three.title: Moї сервіси
Screen-three.subtitle: Чим я займаюсь
Screen-three.desc: Uniquely e-enable corporate growth strategies with scalable experiences. Rapidiously orchestrate mission-critical channels rather than tactical methodologies.
Screen-three.service-web-desc: Strategy formulation is built on the match between all organisation resources and skills based program. Design is the first thing that catches.
